document_data.name: Finch
document_data.mainbody: A '''finch''' ({{Plural|finches}}) was a species of [[songbird]] that could be found in the Realms.

Sub-Species.'''Golden finches''': a species of finches with colorful plumage. They could be found in [[Cormyr]]'s [[Farsea Marshes]] and [[Tun Marshes]], as well as the [[Black Plain]] of [[Sembia]].

document_data.Habitats: In general, finches were known to inhabit the [[Starwood]] area of [[Cormanthor]]. In [[Kara-tur]], multi-colored finches could be found inhabiting the [[Valley of Wings]].<ref>{{Cite dungeon/8/The Flowers of Flame|55}}
document_data.Trivia: * The ''[[staff of birdcalls]]'' allowed its wielder to mimic the call of a finch.
